education_text.0: Black was previously Head of the Department of Information and Software Systems at the      University of Westminster University of Westminster, and senior research associate at      University College London University College London (UCL)Black was previously Head of the Department of Information and Software Systems at the      University of Westminster University of Westminster, and senior research associate at      University College London University College London (UCL)At the end of 2015, Black published a book about the process, Saving Bletchley Park,          initially funded via   Black was also one of the 30 women identified in the British Computer Society's Women in IT Campaign in 2014, who were then featured in the book  Women in IT
